data.title: Energy Policy - Subject Profile
data.meta_description: In the coming parliamentary session, a rapidly changing and increasingly complex energy landscape will lead to multiple converging issues affecting the way that energy for electricity, heat and transport is produced and used. This briefing provides an introduction to the key policy issues and recent developments in Scotland and the UK, in a global context.
